thread.title: Man Dies in Fire at Trump Tower in New York

author: wsjcom
title: Man Dies in Fire at Trump Tower in New York
text:
One man died in a fire at Trump Tower in New York City after the blaze broke out on the 50th floor early Saturday evening, fire officials said.
Firetrucks were seen rushing to the midtown building, sirens blasting. Photos posted on Twitter showed flames and smoke coming out of windows at the midtown skyscraper.
President Donald Trump tweeted...
